text: Hastings is a city in the Hawke's Bay region of New Zealand's North Island. It is the administrative centre of the Hastings District. In 2023, it has about 51,000 people live there. Hastings is about 18 km of Napier. These two neighbouring cities are called "The Bay Cities" or "The Twin Cities". Category:Cities in New Zealand Category:Hastings District
title: Hastings, New Zealand
